resources.string:
RICH Invitation is a Digital Invitation Card in the form of Mobile App. 

Whether you are planning a Wedding, Celebrating Wedding Anniversary or Birthdays or organizing a musical night, live shows, c orporate events, RICH Invitations helps you to send Awesome and beautiful customized digital invitations to your guests. 

A Kind of invitation which is never seen before. With this app both Host and Guest will not miss single detail of the event.

Pawan Kumar Upadhyay
